title.@value: ARIANE ‘Interoperability of skills frameworks’ ISF BB

description.@value: Currently, data on individuals' skills is fragmented across various platforms, hindering both personal awareness and the ability of organizations to provide optimal opportunities. The Ariane ISF Software is designed with comprehensive ergonomic, functional, and technical specifications to ensure data openness and interoperability, maximizing its usability. It consolidates data from multiple sources, allowing it to be viewed in a standardized format with competence values, and can integrate training data enriched with skills and skill blocks.
